name: Emporium (itch) (DataGhost)
description:
Emporium is a short horror game made for the Scream Lite(TM). Everything excluding some of the sounds/music used (which there is a list of below) was made in one week using Gamemaker Studio 2.

You play as a mute store owner selling apples to people before a blizzard hits the town. But. . . why would anyone need apples for a blizzard? There are two endings, each as bleak as the next.

The only key you need to play is the spacebar, used to to advance text.

Music:

Cacola - island.1

Muzak Orchestra - Star Eyes

Enjoy, and please report any bugs you find! Constructive criticism is welcome.
